reviews.text:
I walked past this place and decided to visit for lunch. I peered into the restaurant and it was completely empty during busy lunchtime where other restaurants were so busy. I asked for table for 1 and then this young female staff asked me to come in and sit. Just as I was about to sit, another female staff came out and told me "no tables- full". So hard to believe the restaurant was "full" looking at the emptiness inside.
Then she changed and said "inside only for more than 4 people" and said I could sit outside if I wanted to dine.
I said "okay" reluctantly and then I started to order the food. While the food was being prepared, suddenly the wind got stronger and I felt cold. So the food was served and then I started eating. Within a while I felt the chills and I asked if I could shift inside and the answer I got was a firm "NO".
As I was eating the Piadina, the winds got stronger and my food starting flying around. A quarter of the flatbread flew under the opposite table and vegetables also flew to other chairs. I was so frustrated that I decided to leave without finishing the food.
And as I went into the restaurant to make payment, it was not even a quarter full, and I saw 2 groups of pairs sitting inside.
So unhappy that the food didn't taste nice and I had to endure this kind of treatment from the staff.
Bad experience and wouldn't recommend this place. I would give an even lower score if I could.
I had the Tagliatelle al ragù which I got recommended by a person from Bologna. Tasty and quickly prepared. The staff was a bit colder. It felt like a local pub. There are toilets.
Good food , various dishes on the menu . There were 2 types of daily menu to choose or you can order from a classic menu . Prices are very reasonable , good location

No copperto at least we didnt pay with 1 menu and 1 dish for the other person.
Price good, service good, food good but normal, not amazing pasta, not amazing gnocchi, not amazing cotoleta.
Menu without drink was 12 euros ( 1 dish tagliatelle and second dish cotoleta there is no choice menu) , 2 euros less than if you order them separetely.
Caffe latte 2 euros.
In the entrance of San Marino, terraze for 3 or 4 tables was good, inside is notnso much.
Cozy place, very tasty food for reasonable price. Also the food was served very fast
